body: And also I forgot to add this, the fact that there's a lot happening in this doujin that only has 18 pages is amazing. It has 11 pages for the H scene if we start from page 7 and end in page 17 and the rest of the pages (7) is just the story itself. Again, another amazing vanilla doujin by Yuzushiko-sensei. Can't wait for your next work!!

Just read @ntr_reviewers review. All the points he made is true. I'm a vanilla man and I agree that this is not NTR. The story doesn't make sense if the girl was actually cheating on his sensei. I mean, she did anything he asked her to. If that's not love I don't know what it is. I don't really wanna blame you guys for thinking that this is NTR cause I am also very sensitive when it comes to NTR but there are doujins like this where it just makes you think that it's an NTR but It's really just vanilla. Now, I am mad that the girl used "NTR" to make her teacher be jealous. But still, It's really wholesome as fuck. I'd rate this a 10/10.

I'm pretty sure that's not NTR. The way the NTR parts are portrayed is in the cohabitation of Sensei's imagination, producing seamless guilt that he felt, which you, the reader, in return also experienced.

The fact 50% of esteemed gentlemen in the comment section can't accept the Image Video as proof the story isn't NTR means the story did its job; to make you feel you're the Sensei who he thought had her dear student stolen.

My initial verdict is 8/10 because I got hurt, dude. It had me in the first half for real. But then again, the fact I felt the pain means it's good.

Statistics
Art: 9/10
Plot: 8/10
Twist: 7/10 (I got hurt in a good way)
Wholesome Meter: 10/10
Exposition: 7/10 (need more pages to elaborate that there is no NTR, and it's just imagination)

Final Verdict: 8.2/10

Read a comment on e-hentai that said there were some translation errors, and that is was basically a sofcore porn video without nudity.  Thus, no penetration, no nudity. Heres the comments.

"Couple of corrections:
He said she took something more than a finger, implying a dick (as shown by the frame).
At the end she's saying she's not even old enough to be in an AV.


"I noted it before, but the translation note is wrong. IV are not slideshows, it's gravure videos. Sometimes erotic scenarios, but no nudity, and everything is simulated and hidden with camera tricks and angles. It's pretty common for gravure idols, and generally it's less "active" than a normal movie sex scene (like I said, no nudity). It's done mainly for the sounds and expressions of the idol. Nothing happened to her other than some touching that doesn't go beyond what a massage would do."

Not NTR.

Just watch a gravure idol photoshoot making-of video instead of commenting unsubstantiated interpretations. They don't have sex or perform any sexual acts with the model, it's just erotic photography meant to look like an ecchi manga. There can be groping shots and they often have wet t-shirts or douse the model in oil/lube.  It's no different from actresses doing bedroom scenes. In fact it's milder because there's no kissing and they don't move.

Attention all newcomers! This is not an NTR or cheating. What was shown page 6 was not actually her getting with other guys. It was just a still image of her being a model or a look-a-like (refer to translation note on page 18). As others have pointed out, this was just an erotic photoshoot. As you even saw in some panels she wasn’t even nude. So calm down and actually READ before assuming. Once again this not an NTR.

This is why there is no netorare or cheating tag. There was no cheating. The heroine only did an erotic gravure photoshoot. Yes groping shots are not uncommon in gravure but they're even more mild than your typical Hollywood actress doing a bedroom scene as they only place their hands on the model without moving. From the panels she didn't even get nude. So now you inkwells can rest assured that she was still a virgin like you before the Sensei penetrated her defenses.

For people unfamiliar with Japanese Gravure Photoshoots: No she did not have sex with the dudes. Erotic gravure isn't like western porn. They are basically lewd photos with the model in different scenarios and photographed from different angles. The models don't perform any sexual acts with other people but do sometimes allow themselves to be groped in some shots.
